snippet: Millions of dollars in drugs came into Kennedy Airport from Barbados in the bellies of commercial jets.
abstract: Former American Airlines baggage handler Victor Bourne, who was convicted of leading cocaine-smuggling ring at Kennedy International Airport, is sentenced to life in prison.
lead_paragraph: Millions of dollars in drugs came into Kennedy Airport from Barbados in the bellies of commercial jets.

headline.seo: J.F.K. Baggage Handler Who Smuggled Cocaine in Planes Gets Life Term
headline.main: Baggage Handler Who Smuggled Cocaine in Planes Is Sentenced to Life
headline.print_headline: Bag Handler At J.F.K. Gets Life Sentence In Drug Case
